actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude working capital in applying the accumulated earnings tax.
short_title: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003

summary.text: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude working capital from inclusion in the calculation of accumulated earnings tax.

titles.title: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude working capital in applying the accumulated earnings tax.
